documents.document: Anyone else spend the last year wanderlusting over @airbnb from all over the world? Just me?I curated my very own wishlist in partnership with them and hope I can share the magic of these spaces with my kids some day soon. https://t.co/CVq8Uwhm8D

RT @JocelynLeavitt: @mindykaling We are not technically GenX. We are part of a micro generation born btwn 78-83. Dubbed Xennials / the O
Like I skateboard to Ben Stillers house and we listen to Nirvana
I cant believe Im technically Gen X. Like my aesthetic is the movie Singles and Ethan Hawke and Jennifer Jason Leigh are my contemporaries

Continuing to share resources to support the Covid crisis in India. Everything helps. Donations go directly to healthcare physical infrastructure, medical equipment, and vaccine support and mobilization. @GiveIndia https://t.co/Kka7AYluOc

After surviving this last year, the very least Tom Hanks and Meg Ryan could do for us is star in my sequel to Youve Got Mail

@caitlincarrickm Gotta disagree with you in this one. Tom Hanks is the platonic ideal movie man in YGM (confident, witty, ruthless tycoon with a great apartment), but Billy C is equally great as mildly tortured adorable overthinking Jewish boyfriend
WHMS has the one-liners, the incredible observations, the Washington Square, the Bruno Kirby... but Youve Got Mail has: I wanted it to be you. I wanted it to be you so badly. https://t.co/RNwq4QX9ea
